edu.qs.frc.threading

Class AvianceThreadManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.qs.frc.threading.AvianceThreadManager

  • public class AvianceThreadManager
extends Object
    Responsible for maintaining thread groups, Each group may be started or interrupted on demand. The neat thing about this manager is that any thread group could safely reside here without fear of being interrupted unless the interrupter knows the group ID
    Author:
    pawel

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addThread(String groupID, AvianceThread thread)
      Adds a thread to a specified thread group succeeds if the specified thread group exists and does not already contain the thread If the group's status is set to running and the added thread is not already running then the thread is started
      boolean createGroup(String groupID)
      Creates a new thread group with the specified name, the first object is always a Boolean with the group's state.
      static AvianceThreadManager getInstance() 
      boolean interruptThreads(String groupID)
      Interrupts all threads in a given thread group
      void removeGroup(String groupID)
      Stops execution of all threads in a specified thread group and removes the group
      void removeThread(String groupID, AvianceThread thread)
      Removes the specified thread form the specified thread group
      boolean startThreads(String groupID)
      Starts execution of all threads that are not already running in the specified thread group

        public boolean interruptThreads(String groupID)
        Interrupts all threads in a given thread group
        Parameters:
        groupID -
        Returns:
        FALSE if the specified thread group does not exist

      • startThreads

        public boolean startThreads(String groupID)
        Starts execution of all threads that are not already running in the specified thread group
        Parameters:
        groupID -
        Returns:
        FALSE if the group does not exists

      • addThread

        public boolean addThread(String groupID,
                AvianceThread thread)
        Adds a thread to a specified thread group succeeds if the specified thread group exists and does not already contain the thread If the group's status is set to running and the added thread is not already running then the thread is started
        Parameters:
        groupID - The ID of the group as a String
        thread - Thread to ass to the group
        Returns:
        TRUE if thread was added to the group, FALSE if the specified group does not exist

      • removeThread

        public void removeThread(String groupID,
                AvianceThread thread)
        Removes the specified thread form the specified thread group
        Parameters:
        groupID -
        thread - thread to be removed

      • removeGroup

        public void removeGroup(String groupID)
        Stops execution of all threads in a specified thread group and removes the group
        Parameters:
        groupID -

      • createGroup

        public boolean createGroup(String groupID)
        Creates a new thread group with the specified name, the first object is always a Boolean with the group's state. on creation group's state is false
        Parameters:
        groupID - The name of the group
        Returns:
        FALSE if the group already exists

        public static AvianceThreadManager getInstance()
